removeAlligator(Alligator) - Method in class objectsarrays.RiverItems
Removes an alligator from the alligator linked list.
removeBus(Bus) - Method in class objectsarrays.Vehicles
Removes a bus from the bus linked list.
removeCar(Car) - Method in class objectsarrays.Vehicles
Removes a car from car linked list.
removeLog(Log) - Method in class objectsarrays.RiverItems
Removes a log from the log linked list.

Removes a taxi from the taxi linked list.
removeTruck(Truck) - Method in class objectsarrays.Vehicles
Removes a truck from the truck linked list.
removeTurtle(Turtle) - Method in class objectsarrays.RiverItems
Removes a turtle line from the turtle linked list.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Alligator
Draws the alligator on the screen according to its x, y position and the figure it is define by the tick() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.AlligatorBank
Draws the river bank alligator on the screen according to its x, y position and the figure it is define by the tick() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Bus
Draws the alligator on the screen according to its x, y position and the image defined the the constructor.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Car
Draws the car on the screen according to its x, y position and the image defined by the constructor.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Entity
Draws the entity object on the screen according to its position and respective image.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Frog
Draws the player on the screen according to its x and y position and the respective image according
to it movement defined by the tick() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Log
Draws the log on the screen according to its x and y positions defined by the tick() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Taxi
Draws the taxi on the screen according to its x and y positions.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Truck
Draws the truck image on the screen according to its x and y positions and its respective image defined by the tick() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class entities.Turtle
Draws the turtles line on the screen according to its x and y position and the direction the are moving to.
render(Graphics) - Method in class objectsarrays.RiverItems
Goes through every position available on the linked lists and call the objects render() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class objectsarrays.Vehicles
Goes through every position available on the linked lists and call the objects render() method.
render(Graphics) - Method in class states.GameStates
Draw the game state on the screen.
render(Graphics) - Method in class states.Playing
Draws the player score and life on the screen.
Call the render() method of all objects in the game state.
Right() - Method in class input.KeyManager
Getter for the boolean variable that indicates to move right.
RiverItems - Class in objectsarrays
This class holds the linked lists that helps the creation of the objects of the game.
RiverItems() - Constructor for class objectsarrays.RiverItems
 
run() - Method in class game.Game
This method is called when the game thread is started, right after the start() method.
It initiates the display, the assets and the states of the game.
It also contains the MAIN GAME LOOP;
